To run any of the chunks of R script in this file, please insert *video-games.csv* into the same folder as this file. 


```{r}
df <- read.csv("video-games.csv")
```

```{r}
set.seed(1234)
split <- sample(1:nrow(df), nrow(df)*.8, replace=FALSE)
train <- df[ split, ]
test <- df[ -split, ]
```

```{r}
lm1 <- lm(Global_Sales~Critic_Score, data=train)
summary(lm1)
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(lm1)

```
